duties_responsibilities.duty: Design financial and accounting models for business interruption, extra expense, and other insurance claim losses.
Prepare annual business interruption and property renewal values for companies in various industries.
Analyze financial statements and other documentation, and develop sensitivity analyses related to loss measurements.
Reconcile claim amounts to accounting systems and insurers’ calculations.
Participate on multiple engagements with varying project size and scope.

education_certification.credential: Pursuing a Bachelor’s Degree in accounting or finance with an expected graduation date between December 2024 and June 2025.
